Advanced Chemical Industries
ACI's Mission is to enrich the quality of life of the people through responsible application of knowledge, technology and skills

patterns: Where is ACI head office located
responses: ACI Centre 245, Tejgaon Industrial Area, Dhaka-1208, Bangladesh

patterns: Name the major business units of ACI
responses: Agribusiness, Pharma, Consumer Brands & Logistics (Shwapno)

patterns: What are the core values of ACI
responses: · Quality · Customer Focus· Innovation · Fairness· Transparency· Continuous Improvement

patterns: Mention the policies followed by ACI
responses: Quality Policy: ISO 9001 Quality Management System.  (ACI is the first company in Bangladesh to have obtained ISO 9001 Certification for Quality Management System across all categories.) Safety, Health and Environment (SHE) Policy: ISO 14001 Environmental Management System. (ACI is the first company in Bangladesh to have obtained ISO 14001 Certification for Environmental Management System)

patterns: What recent move has been taken by ACI
responses: ACI Formulations Ltd. have set up their ETP at Gazipur

patterns: What footprint does ACI have in the field of Research & Development
responses: Popularization of Mechanical Rice Transplantation, Research & Development on Molecular Breeding Under ASRBC, Promoting climate smart agriculture in the coastal belt of Bangladesh

patterns: What sets this company apart from its competitors
responses: The achievements of ACI sets its’ uniqueness from the rest.Such as: ICAB has awarded ACI Limited for Best Presented Annual Reports–2016,ACI Crop Care wins Agrow Award 2017

patterns: What was the previous name of ACI
responses: Imperial Chemical Industries (ICI)

patterns: Name of the Chairman of ACI group
who is Chairman of ACI group
responses: M. Anis Ud Dowla, Chairman, ACI Group
Chairman, ACI Group

patterns: Name of the managing director of ACI group
Name of the md of ACI group
responses: Dr. Arif Dowla, managing director, ACI Group
Managing Director, ACI Group

patterns: What are the industries of ACI Group
responses: chemicals, foods, pharma, consumer products, logistics, consumer electronics, automobile services, communication
